definitions: used to represent a sound such as that made by the passage of a bullet or that of a small, muffled explosion

examples.text: Phut! Up went the Roman candles, like distress flares

shortDefinitions: used to represent sound such as that made by passage of bullet

definitions: used to convey the suddenness of a malfunction, disappearance, etc.

examples.text: we've all been there—you've just spent the last five hours carefully crafting a document and then, phut!

shortDefinitions: used to convey the suddenness of an ending etc.
